## 2. Methods

### 2.1 Preprocessing and integration

Key steps:
- Cleaning and standardising IDs (tract GEOID, facility IDs)
- Merging hospital, buffer hospitals, and community health centers into one supply layer
- Validating population counts (ACS baseline, WorldPop cross-check)
- Constructing SVI and Medicaid-related indicators

### 2.3 Machine learning clustering and neighborhood typologies

Using **KMeans clustering from scikit-learn**, tract-level indicators are clustered into interpretable neighborhood types.
